gen:link.msg:message: `InvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfParticipants` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_InvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfParticipants')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_InvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfParticipants return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfParticipantsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfParticipantsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfParticipantsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfParticipantsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfPensionFund` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_InvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfPensionFund')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_InvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfPensionFund return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfPensionFundCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfPensionFundCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfPensionFundDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsOnBehalfOfPensionFundDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentResults` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_InvestmentResults')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_InvestmentResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
